pullRequest.title: Add Tenant class and its create and update request classes.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request adds the Tenant class as part of adding multi-tenancy support (see issue #332).
This is the first file which uses AutoValue, so I've added the relevant dependency.
I cherrypicked a few commits from pull request #334 in order to fix two tests that were failing at the time that the micahstairs-multitenacity branch was created.

commit.message: Add Tenant class and AutoValue dependency.
Fix javadoc comments in Tenant class and add newline char to end of file.

nodes.bodyText:
I think we should make newBuilder() package-private. We don't expect clients to be able to use this builder directly, right?
Looks like I already had made the Builder class package private, but it's methods are public, which should be changed as well.

nodes.bodyText: Actually, do we ever need to build an instance of Tenant? It looks like they always get constructed from the JSON responses sent by the Auth backend service, in which case we can just rely on the JSON deserialization support we have.

commit.message: Use JSON deserialization to construct Tenant and add CreateRequest and UpdateRequest autovalue classes.
